description: This file defines a team of agents and tools for web and news information gathering about a company, including asynchronous event handling and execution logic.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with specific instructions and members.

classes.name: TeamRunEvent
classes.description: Enumeration of team-related run events such as start, completion, and tool calls.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an individual agent with specific capabilities and tools.

classes.name: HackerNewsTools
classes.description: Tools for searching Hacker News articles.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web search via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: AI model from Anthropic used for language understanding.

methods.name: run_team_with_events
methods.description: Asynchronous function to run the team with a given prompt and handle various team and member events.
